documents.document:
my biggest mistake

The biggest mistake I have made in my life was giving you back your heart.
I didn’t know what I was doing at the time but now I realise how much of a loser I was to let u go. I shattered both of hearts into millions of pieces with out even knowing. Now your gone baby I realise how much I love you how much I need you in my life to make it whole. Trying to love another is just impossible u was the one for me but it’s to late now. How stupid I was in the first place to leave u to suffer with out realising thinking you wouldn’t care and u was better of with out me maybe I was wrong cause now look where you are no where, you are gone. I can’t do any thing but remember all the good times we had together and remember al the things u taught me and told me. In my head all I hear is your voice going over and over again saying I love you. You could never say it enough just if I believed you. Just if I realised all this before it was to late, now I have to suffer loving some one I can’t be with for the rest of my life. I want you to be hear by my side so I could tell you face to face how I really feel about you.

hey

hey well my life the last 3 weeks has bn up and down wit emotions but i have had the best person ever there for me beside me the hole tym supporting me and im so glad i got him..its my best friend zac. his so gorguz his my life so glad i got him in my life his such a sweetie..i lovbe him to bits

im sorry

Im sorry for being me
Im sorry for talking to you
Im sorry for loving you
Im sorry for coming into,
Your life and wrecking it
Im sorry I cause you,
So much pain
Im sorry im sorry im sorry
But what im not sorry is for
Telling you how I felt
Praying every night
For this to be over
Im not sorry for
Looking past your eyes
And finding out the real you
Im not sorry
For crying all those tears
Im sorry that I was
Stupid enough to fall for you
Im sorry for
Falling into your arms
Im sorry that this is
How it has to end
Im sorry that this
Is the final good bye
…………………….
Im sorry
But this her mum
Im sorry to say but
She is in a better place
My little princess is gone
Im sorry beautiful daughter of mine
That I didn’t realize how u felt
Or I would have done
Some thing about it
Im sorry for not giving
You the attention you needed
Im sorry for not being there
For you when u needed me the most

i have no idear of a tittle for this but still read it

Laying here wit tears running down my checks with so much heart ache.
Not thinking straight then suddenly, I brake a promises I made to a loved one.
A razor blade sliding across my skin, with blood rushing out. Dropping the razor with realizing what I had done. But it was too late I couldn’t take it back laying back down on my pillow with a puddle of blood underneath my arm where the blood was still coming out. But why does this seem to happen every night? Is this a punishment for my self or just a pain relief? All I know is that when it happens I think of you and the pain you have caused me. And how much of a failure I am for letting you leave my life.

hey peeps

hey well havnt been on here for a while thought i would sign in and update man i ddint realise how long it had been so much has happened lol well check out me now alot has changed lol

madz

xx

life

Why is life so meaningless? We get put on this earth to enjoy being little. Being hurt confused depressed and not many making it through teen years then the complications’ of the real world. Why cant life be a happy place its not like we get a second chance so the first chance should be the best ever the happiest ever. Yes people make mistakes and people find out, so people shouldn’t judge people by their mistakes in life because we only live one life. Just forgive and forget.
I never want to bring another into this horrible world so they have to suffer like I had and have to and I bet more suffering to happen in the future. Its just not worth having to be down cause u see your own going through the same pain as you did all those years ago. I don’t see the point. I think we should put an end to all of this and go back to the wonderful 60’s where every one was happy. yeah maybe they didn’t have to best fashion but who cares, its feelings what mean more then what you look like.

hey peeps

wel umm yup date if u read my other blogs well ummd ont ask i ahve no idear fuck i was messed up shit i never realised i have a new moto u onli live ones so make the most of it brake every rule never hold back tell ppl how u feel its just pointless if u sit there and cry or mop in sorrow from ur past. dont think of the past think of the present and future but normally thr future cause the futures light is always brighter then the presents. i have a new pasion. its meeting new ppl. i decied to get out my box and meet new ppl. its fun im loving it. i try to meet or talk to a new person a week and another thing i have started dn s to talk to ppl i normally wouldnt tlka to cause i use to hate them 4 sum reason and thats so funone perosn who i have started tlkaing to again i was surprised they r acually awsum. any way beta go chat lata guys love me x.x.x

me and my fucked life

im tyring in life but not getting any where.

well what made feel like this i had my perfect guy every thing was going along fine we was happy and every thing my life was perfect then he left me.....i havnt bn the same since its o annoying...my views on life and just me all together i think ima diff persdon and i dont like it... he is my life and i want my life back. i dont no wat to think i dont no wat to do wit my tym. i thought i was over all the sadness i thought it was just a stage every teenager goes through but this is for real and i dont no if i wil ever get over it

about you

known you as little time as possable but it seems like enternity.
when i not tlkaing to u im thinking of what you are properly doing and how you make me fel.
even tho u hardly know me i trust you and some how u make me feel wanted. even tho there si a ocean inbetween of us it feels like we are as close as bro and sis. leting some stranger in my life was a risk what im glad i tok cause i got you. i just hope that this will never end.

me and u

there is shit load of water between of us but that cant stop us from best friends. and sharing our lives with each other. you have been the only person who has been able to put a smile on my face and made me feel wanted. you have put the colopur back into me. cause of you i now see the sun insted of the darkness. if you make me feel like this is in a couple of days, then what wil you make me feel like in a couple of years when we are still best friends. nothing will stop me from being your friend.

wat bordem does

sitin in the dark
wit nothing going through her mind
she picks up the sharp object
and starts cutting
not realising what she has done
when it is to late.
the next morning
the sun rises
and lets a bit of light into her room
when she looks and see what she has done.
she starts crying and screaming for help
but more she creams
the quiet her voice seems to get.
but this is just one of million nights this is of her life

him and her

seeing her smile makes him smile
as he hugs her she crys on the inside and shatters more and mroe each hug
but on the outside she smiles to keep him happy

when she all by her self sitting in the corner thinking of him she crys n the insde to the outside real tears rolling down her face making her eyes red and puffy. crying for hours making her sleepy as she puts her head on the pillow and the tears roll onto the pillow as she sleeps.

when his alone and thinking of her he is happy and goes to sleep with a smile on his face

but this is a just another day of her heart braking

him and her smile

she wakes up every morning doing the same thing putting on a mask to hide the real her. then comes home at night to go to bed and cry till its time to wake up again.
but one day that all changes
she gets up late and doesnt have time to put the mask on she goes out and her dream guy walks up to her and asked her for hernumber. she thoght she was dreaming but she wasnt
so insted of coming home at night and crying she caqme home with a smile on her face while she had him in her arms and layed with him till she slept with a smile on her face.

him

been in the back of my mind for so long
but only just now i realised how special you acually are
now that your by my side i just want to take ur hand and never let go. there is just some thing standing in my way what is topping me from doing that.
but hopefuly soon i will be in ur arms while i look up at u as u tell me u love me till the end as a tear will drop down my face of happiness.

pushing the guy away who i love

pushing the guy away from me who i love.
i love him to much to lie to others

wishes do come true

as she sits on her window legde watching the rain drops fall over the wondow
she thinks and wonders
what is he doing now??
is he sitting on the beach with another or is he doing the same as her??
has he forgotten about me or does he think about me every day like she does???
as the sun goes down and stars shine in black sky....
she lays on her bed wit her hea din the pillow crying tears the rain drops what she watchs every day.

one day this all changes as she goes to sit on the window edge there is no rain...the sun is shinning through her window.. but she still sits there but this day was diffrent...she sees him walk up towards her house but sher thought this was just her imagination like every other time she has seen him..but then the dor bell rings and her mum yells out to her..she slowly walks down the stairs with tears slowly falling down her face.
then she sees him bright green eyes looking staright at her, and his bootiful big smile as she walks closer. she cant help but smile.

all over just like that

Neva knew u existed
until that day i found you
you stuck bye me 4 a few years
god we had some fun
did things behinds our parents back
even played games on other friends
but yet so simple
it ended so easily
with no tears just memories
it was all over
now when we talk
its like nothing ever happened

ended so quickly

even tho it was only a few days not realli even worth menchaning it seemed like a life. u made me so happy and 4 once in my life i felt wanted and not chated. u was the only person i trusted in this world. u said u loved me i told u i love u back u said u was happy and i told u i was the luckiest person alive to have you. you seemed so happy so why did u end it so quickly. now i sit in my room and fade away more and more each day but stil no one notices. you dont even care any more but i still dont get it. was it all justa big lie or just a big dream and i finally woke up?? plz i want to no if there is any point of staying here with hope u will come running back into my arms one day or should i just give up now and say good bye???

well man single life loving but hating it cause rembering why ims ingle hruts so muc trying to get ova him is so hard i was like in love with him. da first tym i eva saw him it was like love at first syt so yeah i think i do believe in that...how weird but hey i think its awsum. any way anotha bout my fuckd love life today was da athletics carnival it was fukcn cold. a punch of us were cudling up together wit blankets and we filled our drinks bottles yp wit hot water but then um oen made an awsum descoverie that the girls toilets were warm so yeah every one was lie in there well the girls any way hehe it was stil codl tho but warmer then just being out side. well i haev been single a week tomoz and hating not being wit my ex now tat is so depressaing syaing his my ex cause fuck i love him so much hios like so awsome i was so lucky to have gone out wit and shared lifes together 4 a short time but lets just hope our friend ship stil stays strong as it was b4 we went out. any way i beat go leave comments plz ppl tata peace out love madz x x x
